content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Max. I'm glad you're interested. What is your budget for the rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 600 Euros per month. I would like to negotiate the rental price to the lowest possible while still being able to pay the monthly rent and be on good terms with the landlord.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Max. I see that you have a budget of 600 Euros per month. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a monthly rental price of 700 Euros. This would be a fair market value for a 25 square meter apartment in a desirable location. However, I am open to negotiating within reason. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can we agree on 550 Euros per month?

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am willing to pay a little more than my budget if it means I can be on good terms with my landlord.

I will pay the rent on time and I will take good care of the apartment. I am willing to sign a long-term lease if that is an option.

I understand that the rental market is competitive and that the landlord may not be able to agree to my request. However, I would like to try to negotiate the rental price to the lowest possible while still being able to pay the monthly rent and be on good terms with the landlord.

TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Max. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. However, as a landlord, I must prioritize my financial interests and I am unable to agree to a rental price lower than 700 Euros per month.

I understand that the rental market can be competitive, but I must maintain my profit margins and cover my expenses in order to continue providing a high-quality living space for my tenants. I hope you can understand my position and appreciate the value of the apartment.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
